remarks: The W atoms function.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

watomfval.p $e |- P = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
watomfval.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
watfvalN $p |- ( K e. B -> W = ( d e. A |-> ( A \ ( ( _|_P ` K ) ` { d } ) ) ) ) $.
$d A d $.
$d K d $.
